en-US.name: Cave Quest
en-US.description: The Cave Quest expansion pack includes 5 brand new adventures for your collection. Venture into even deeper and darker caves with Emerald and her friends, and collect up to 30 unique treasures. Adventures will automatically be playable once you've completed your purchase, and you can play them as often as you'd like.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: Pink Unicorns includes 5 new adventures with Emerald and her friends.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Enjoy Pink Unicorns by asking Alexa to play cave quest.

testingInstructions: Ask pink unicorns to shop or to buy.
